mdRecord.dcterms:title: Taxe des parties casuelles de la boutique du pape / en Latin & en François : Auec annotations prinses des decretz, Concilles, & Canons tant vieux que modernes, pour la verification de la discipline anciennement obseruee en l'Eglise. ; Par A.P.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Du Pinet, Antoine, active 16th century
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes the text of the Taxae Cancellariae Apostolicae, in Latin and French, with critical commentary by the Calvinist Antoine Du Pinet.
Printed in Geneva, according to Brunet.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 175.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Catholic Church--Finance
Catholic Church--Controversial literature
Dispensations (Canon law)--Early works to 1800
